attributes.action: Opposition of  withdrawal of rioters' benefits - will result in consequential crime
attributes.additional_details:
The current petition of withdrawing convicted rioters benefits is a ‘knee-jerk’ reaction by some members of the UK public, who are understandably angry over the recent riots.  However, by taking away all means of income from these people to “teach them a lesson etc” would be a very bad thing for ALL us UK citizens.  Think about this, so someone who has already got the mentality of robbing a store without guilt, would then have no means to FEED THEMSELVES, would simply go and 1) rob/shoplift, 2) mug people and 3) burglarise your house.

Result: massive crime increase against the person in the UK.

Irony: get imprisoned and get fed. get non-custodial and starve and have to rob.

There are way more ways to appropriately punish people for their wrong-doings. Please oppose the withdrawal of benefits.
